text: Faithful in My Fashion is a 1946 American romantic comedy movie directed by Sidney Salkow and starring Donna Reed, Tom Drake, Edward Everett Horton, Spring Byington, Harry Devonpart. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * Category:1946 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Salkow
title: Faithful in My Fashion
